HR.Patient

      java.util.ArrayList<Patient> Physician.getPatientOverseeing()

      java.util.ArrayList<Patient> Nurse.getPatientTransported() 
      Methods in HR with parameters of type Patient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Nurse.addPatientRegistered(Patient patientRegistered)
      add a patient to the list Nurse.patientRegistered
      void Transporter.dropPatient(Patient patient)
      drop the patient in the Transporter.targetRoom and set the patient to the good state : from waitingForMRI to transportation to waitingForMRIT from waitingForBloodTest to transportation to waitingForBloodTestT from waitingForRadio to transportation to waitingForRadioT from bloodTested/mriTested/radioTested to transportation to WaitingForConsultation set the state of the transporter to idle
      void Nurse.dropPatient(Patient patient)
      Drop the patient in the targeted waiting room, it : set the patient state to waitingForConsultation add the patient to the target room the the nurse state to idle
      void Physician.emitVerdict(Patient patient)
      Emit the verdict a the end of the exam : set the patient state to released add this event to the patient history set the departure time of the patient remove the patient from the Physician.patientOverseeing add the patient to the Physician.patientAlreadyTreated
      void Physician.handleNewPatient(Patient patient, Rooms.Room consultationRoom)
      A method where the physician handle a new patient : set the state of the patient to inConsultation set the state of the physician to visiting add the patient to the Physician.patientOverseeing set the state of the room to occupied set the setPhysician(Physician) add this event to the patient history set the Patient#setDtdtime(TimeStamp)
      void Physician.prescribe(Patient patient, Rooms.Room consultationRoom)
      Using the probability it gives a prescription add the end of the consultation to the patient .
      void Nurse.register(Patient patient)
      A method to register a patient it : adds the patient to ED.getEdRegister() set the state of the patient an dmove it to the good list of ED.getDbPatient()
      void Transporter.transport(Patient patient, Rooms.Room targetRoom)
      A method to transport a patient, it : set the Transporter.targetRoom set the Transporter.lastPatientState set the patient state to transportation set the transporter state to transportation add the patient to the list Transporter.patientTransported set the Transporter.startTime set the Transporter.endTime
      void Nurse.transport(Patient patient, Rooms.Room targetRoom)
      A method to transport the patient to the good target room (here a waiting room) : it : set the target room set the state of the nurse to transporting set the state of the patient to transporting add the patient to Nurse.patientTransported set the start time and the end time
      void Physician.writeMessage(Patient patient, Physician physician, java.lang.String obj, java.lang.String content)
      Write a message about a patient to a physician with an object and a content
